data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Cankuzo prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cankuzo, Burundi
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 61,029 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Cankuzo, Burundi to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Cankuzo, Burundi so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Arab people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, bring yourself glory in Cankuzo. Through your servants plant 40 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Cankuzo.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Cankuzo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
